StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_dbaCreateDummyDODCode]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NewDODCode varchar(20) OUTPUT AS
--============================================================================= -- -- Insert new high school with NO DOD_CODE -- --=============================================================================
declare @size int declare @max_dod_code varchar(20)
set @max_dod_code=(select max(dod_code) from high_school where dod_code like '000%') --print @max_dod_code
set @size=len(@max_dod_code) --print @size
IF (@size=9) BEGIN set @size=@size-len(@max_dod_code+1) -- print @size set @max_dod_code='000000'+convert(varchar(9),(@max_dod_code+1)) set @NewDODCode=@max_dod_code print @max_dod_code
END
IF (@size=8) BEGIN set @size=@size-len(@max_dod_code+1) -- print @size set @max_dod_code='0000000'+convert(varchar(8),(@max_dod_code+1)) set @NewDODCode=@max_dod_code print @max_dod_code
END
IF (@size=7) BEGIN set @size=@size-len(@max_dod_code+1) -- print @size set @max_dod_code='00000000'+convert(varchar(7),(@max_dod_code+1)) set @NewDODCode=@max_dod_code print @max_dod_code
END
IF (@size=6) BEGIN set @size=@size-len(@max_dod_code+1) -- print @size set @max_dod_code='000000000'+convert(varchar(6),(@max_dod_code+1)) set @NewDODCode=@max_dod_code print @max_dod_code
END
IF (@size=5) BEGIN set @size=@size-len(@max_dod_code+1) -- print @size set @max_dod_code='0000000000'+convert(varchar(5),(@max_dod_code+1)) set @NewDODCode=@max_dod_code print @max_dod_code
END
ELSE IF(@size>9) BEGIN print 'The maximum dod code is greater than 9 digits. Please add school manually!' END
--============================================================================================
